price: 99. En hij(Ibraahiem)zei: “Waarlijk, ik ga naar mijn Heer. Hij zal mij leiden!
arabic: وَقَالَ إِنِّي ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: waqāla innī dhāhibun ilā rabbī sayahdīni
